document_data.name: ''Halberd of Sparks''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Halberds of sparks''''' were somewhat common [[enchanted]] [[halberd]]s from the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Description: These halberds had unassuming appearance of ordinary weapons. The {{SI|6'|'"|long=yes}} [[polearm]] was topped with a clever-like axe head with a barbed tip, useful to exploit gaps in opponents' armor.
document_data.Powers: ''Halberds of sparks'' were enchanted with a ''+1'' enchantment and the ability to deal additional lightning damage to its targets.
document_data.History: In [[1281 DR]], one of the ''halberds of sparks'' was located within one of the crypts in the [[Vale of Shadows]] on the [[Spine of the World]].
